fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: An S transformation of GDP growth that expands values close to zero and compresses extreme highs and lows. For positive growth, the transformation is ln(growth + 1). For negative growth, the transformation is -ln(abs(growth -1)). For display purposes only; do not use for analysis.
fxInfo_question: What is the GDP growth rate (rescaled)?
name: e_migdpgrolns
